item.description: Boston Millionaires and Friends are going to Meet Up with the Western Massachusetts Business Network. The semi-annual Premier Business network party is hosted by Dave Caputo of Positronic SEO and Company. Live Rock and Roll music, cook out and kegs of cold beer should make for a festive fall party. Please RSVP with Boston Millionaires. Hope to see you at the party, Clint PS This is a great opportunity to visit western Ma. for the day or weekend and meet many great local people. Holyoke is an investors dream town.
item.name: Boston Millionaires Meet Up with Holyoke, MA. Small Business Owners
